page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: We play ball tig,hospital tig,40/40 and hot chocolate.In{ball tig}you try to hit someone with a ball.The person hit now tries to hit someone else and so on.In{hospital tig}you chase to touch someone.They hold one hand on their body where you touched,then they do the chasing.In{40/40},which is like Hide and Seek,players hide while one stands by a post and counts to 40.She can now look for the others.When she sees one she must race for the post and calls"40/40 I see you John." The first one seen is "it" next time.In {hot chocolate}one person faces the wall and keeps turning to look.The others try to creep up but must stay still when she turns or they are out.You try to reach the wall and shout "hot chocolate."
